text: Jean Gérault (8 May 1904 – 4 November 1988) was a French long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:French male long-distance runners Category:French male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of France
title: Jean Gérault
